Join Thomas Maurer as he sits down with Carlos Mayol Berral, Senior Program Manager at Microsoft for Azure Edge Security, to explore the powerful new capabilities of Windows Server 2025 Security Baseline and App Control. In this in-depth conversation, Carlos shares insights into these essential security features and walks through impressive demos showcasing how to implement them seamlessly.

- How to easily apply the [Windows Server 2025](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/tag/windows-server-2025/) Security Baseline using PowerShell or [Windows Admin Center](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/2018/04/windows-admin-center/).
- The benefits of managing security policies centrally with Azure Arc.
- Best practices and tools to ensure robust security for your Windows Server environment.

## Windows Server 2025 Security Baseline and App Control video

Whether you’re an IT administrator, security professional, or just curious about the latest developments in server security, this video provides actionable insights and hands-on guidance. Don’t miss the chance to learn how to enhance the security and efficiency of your server infrastructure. Watch now and take your server management skills to the next level!
